Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to a tax credit for minimum wages paid to seasonal employees
Summary: Extends the minimum wage reimbursement tax credit to seasonal workers employed for a period of 90 days or less.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the minimum wage reimbursement credit to seasonal employees
